title: Major asparagus producing countries worldwide 2017
summary: The China_mainland was the world 's Major asparagus producing Production by a distance in 2017 , with a metric of 7843162 million tons .
To give this figure some context , Peru was second in the ranking metric at 383098 million tons , substantially lower in metric than that of the China_mainland .
Many of the world 's Major asparagus Production come from the China_mainland .
gold: This statistic depicts the global leading 10 asparagus producing countries in 2017 . In that year , China was the biggest producer of asparagus worldwide , producing approximately 7.8 million metric tons of asparagus . The U.S. production of asparagus amounted to about 685 thousand cwt in 2015 .
